author: schone_wizard
content: can someone explain how the eth1 in eth2 demo works? didn't they have to reprogram geth ?

author: djrtwo
content: Geth has a notion of "consensus engines". The current two are PoW and clique. This demo creates a third that is controlled via RPC (insert block, update head, etc) and the eth2 client (the driver of the consensus) controls geth via this RPC
